thread.title: Athlete of the Week - Taylor Scarbrough
thread.title_full: Athlete of the Week - Taylor Scarbrough

author: Cherokee Tribune (noreply@cherokeetribune.com)
title: Athlete of the Week - Taylor Scarbrough
text:
slideshow 
Taylor Scarbrough - Cherokee - Cross CountryCherokee’s Taylor Scarbrough won the Cherokee County cross country meet Saturday, finishing in 16 minutes, 32.74 seconds.It was almost a minute slower than Scarbrough’s winning time last year (15:46), but he dominated the rain-soaked Boling Park course, finishing more than 10 seconds ahead of any other runner. How long he’s run cross country: Four years Favorite thing about the sport: The freedom it gives you Favorite color: Red Favorite food: Italian sausage pasta Favorite movie: Nacho Libre Favorite musical artist: Mac Miller Dream vacation: To climb Mount Everest Dream car: Ferrari 488 GTB Favorite sports team: Atlanta Falcons Plans for after college: Become a marine biologist Share This Article | similar stories
